trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Gratt is seething with fury.
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_TODO_00<tab>Weaken Gulg knockers, then capture them with coils of wire.
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the captured knockers to Gratt.
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_000<tab>I've just about bloody had it! No more! I'll not stand by and see another theft go unanswered!
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_001<tab>Eh? What am I angry about!? Well, it's them blasted knockers, ain't it!

TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_002<tab>Those grabby bastards latch onto anything─ore, hammers, my favorite bloody pick─and drag it back to their nests! And what for, I ask you!? The little buggers don't even have the concept of value!

TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_003<tab>I swear there'll be no end to this until I teach 'em the error of their ways. Here's the deal, friend: help me catch some of those thieving pests, and I'll see you paid for the trouble. You in?

TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_004<tab>Good. I'll be going south, so you head east until you find a couple of knockers to knock about. Once they're reeling, use this wire to bind those wriggling limbs of theirs, then bring them back here to the village.
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_005<tab>Take that wire, and snare me a couple of knockers! There's a nest of the sneaky blighters over to the east!
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_010<tab>Back already, eh? I managed to catch a few myself, but let's see your haul.

TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_012<tab>If I'm being honest, I was worried that <var 09 E948 ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((a dwarf)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) /var> unfamiliar with the area might walk <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> straight into a pack of hungry iguanas. Glad you proved me wrong!
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_013<tab>...Now, my prehensile pretties! Uncle Gratt is going to teach you to stop stealing ore from the Tholls...and start nicking it from the Goggs instead! Mwahahaha!
